definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: behemoth, i.e. hippopotamus (appar. pl. intens. of foreg.; acc. to Di Job 40:15 cf. De Is 30:6 fr. an (assumed) Egyptain p-ehemau, ox of the water) Job 40:15 (on identity, cf. further Bo:Hieroz. iii. 705); prob. also Ps 73:22 [[בְּהֵמוֹת]] [[הָיִיתִי עִמָָּח]] a behemoth was I with (toward) thee (so Hi De; Che beasts); acc. to De Or also in [[בַּהֲמוֹת]] Is 30:6 the burden of the behemoth of the south (supposed to be a designation of Egypt; but this unlikely, cf. Che Di, rd. therefore) rather beasts of the south, viz. of Judah.
